trans-unit.source: Contains the collection of counter values.
trans-unit.target: 包含的計數器值的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstance.Counters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property returns an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstance.Counters%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性會傳回此類別的執行個體</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSetInstance.Counters%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Releases all unmanaged resources used by this object.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件所使用的 unmanaged 的資源全部釋出。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並透過記憶體回收開始前執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Accesses a counter value in the collection by using the specified counter identifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的計數器的識別碼，以存取集合中的計數器值。

trans-unit.source: Implemented as an indexer in C#.
trans-unit.target: 實作為 C# 中的索引子。

trans-unit.source: This is the identifier you used when you added the counter to the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 這是將計數器加入至計數器集合時所使用的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Accesses a counter value in the collection by using the specified counter name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的計數器名稱來存取集合中的計數器值。

trans-unit.source: Implemented as an indexer in C#.
trans-unit.target: 實作為 C# 中的索引子。

trans-unit.source: To use this overload, you must use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.AddCounter%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterType%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=fullName> method to add the counter to the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個多載，您必須使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.AddCounter%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterType%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>方法，將計數器加入至計數器集合。</xref:System.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterSet.AddCounter%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Diagnostics.PerformanceData.CounterType%2CSystem.String%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This is the name that you used when you added the counter to the counter set.
trans-unit.target: 這是將計數器加入至計數器集合時所使用的名稱。
